languages.text: "Да?! Здорово у вас получилось! Я аж поверил!.." {n}Бродяга с облегчением начинает угодливо хихикать, но спустя пару мгновений сам выхватывает оружие и наводит на вас. Улыбка сползает с его лица.{/n} "А теперь угадай, я тебя тоже "просто пугаю"? Что дашь, чтобы я не вышиб тебе мозги?"

"Yeah? Well, you had me fooled!" {n}The beggar looks relieved and giggles obsequiously, then pulls out his own weapon, and points it at you. His smile is gone.{/n} "Now, what do you reckon? Am I just giving you a scare too? What'll you give me for not blowing your brains out?"
languages.original_text: "Да?! Здорово у вас получилось! Я аж поверил!.." {n}Бродяга с облегчением начинает угодливо хихикать, но спустя пару мгновений сам выхватывает оружие и наводит на вас. Улыбка сползает с его лица.{/n} "А теперь угадай, я тебя тоже "просто пугаю"? Что дашь, чтобы я не вышиб тебе мозги?"

traits.locale_text: "Yeah? Well, you had me fooled!" {n}The vagabond looks relieved and giggles obsequiously, then pulls out his own weapon and points it at you. His smile is gone.{/n} "Now, what do you s'pose — am I just giving you a scare too? What'll you give me for not blowing your brains out?"
traits.speaker: TrampMain

traits.locale_text: "Yeah? Well, you had me fooled!" {n}The beggar looks relieved and giggles obsequiously, then pulls out his own weapon, and points it at you. His smile is gone.{/n} "Now, what do you reckon? Am I just giving you a scare too? What'll you give me for not blowing your brains out?"
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: 「そうか？見事に騙されたよ！」{n}乞食はほっとしたような表情を浮かべ、卑屈な笑いを浮かべ、それから武器を取り出し、あなたに向けた。笑顔は消えている。{/n}「さて、どうする？ビビったか？脳みそを吹き飛ばされたくなきゃ何か渡しな」
languages.original_text: "Yeah? Well, you had me fooled!" {n}The beggar looks relieved and giggles obsequiously, then pulls out his own weapon, and points it at you. His smile is gone.{/n} "Now, what do you reckon? Am I just giving you a scare too? What'll you give me for not blowing your brains out?"

traits.locale_text: 「そうか？見事に騙されたよ！」{n}乞食はほっとしたような表情を浮かべ、卑屈な笑いを浮かべ、それから武器を取り出し、あなたに向けた。笑顔は消えている。{/n}「さて、どうする？ビビったか？脳みそを吹き飛ばされたくなきゃ何か渡しな」
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: “是嘛！我还真是被你骗到了！”{n}乞丐看起来如释重负，谄媚地笑了起来，随后立刻掏出自己的武器，瞄准了你。他脸上的笑容消失了。{/n}“现在呢？你是不是也被我吓了一跳？你要给我些什么东西，才能说服我不要打爆你的脑袋？”
languages.original_text: "Yeah? Well, you had me fooled!" {n}The beggar looks relieved and giggles obsequiously, then pulls out his own weapon, and points it at you. His smile is gone.{/n} "Now, what do you reckon? Am I just giving you a scare too? What'll you give me for not blowing your brains out?"

traits.locale_text: “是嘛！我还真是被你骗到了！”{n}乞丐看起来如释重负，谄媚地笑了起来，随后立刻掏出自己的武器，瞄准了你。他脸上的笑容消失了。{/n}“现在呢？你是不是也被我吓了一跳？你要给我些什么东西，才能说服我不要打爆你的脑袋？”
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: «¿Sí? ¡Me tenía engañado!». {n}El mendigo parece aliviado y suelta una risita pelota, luego saca su propia arma y te apunta con ella. Su sonrisa desaparece.{/n} «¿Y ahora qué? ¿Le asusto? ¿Qué me da por no volarle los sesos?».
languages.original_text: "Yeah? Well, you had me fooled!" {n}The beggar looks relieved and giggles obsequiously, then pulls out his own weapon, and points it at you. His smile is gone.{/n} "Now, what do you reckon? Am I just giving you a scare too? What'll you give me for not blowing your brains out?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Sí? ¡Me tenía engañado!». {n}El mendigo parece aliviado y suelta una risita pelota, luego saca su propia arma y te apunta con ella. Su sonrisa desaparece.{/n} «¿Y ahora qué? ¿Le asusto? ¿Qué me da por no volarle los sesos?».
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: "Ach ja? Tja, ich hab's Euch abgekauft!" {n}Der Bettler wirkt erleichtert und kichert unterwürfig, dann zieht er seine eigene Waffe und richtet sie auf dich. Sein Lächeln ist verschwunden.{/n} "Also, was glaubt Ihr? Will ich Euch auch nur ein bisschen Angst machen? Was gebt Ihr mir dafür, dass ich Euch nicht das Gehirn rauspuste?"
languages.original_text: "Yeah? Well, you had me fooled!" {n}The beggar looks relieved and giggles obsequiously, then pulls out his own weapon, and points it at you. His smile is gone.{/n} "Now, what do you reckon? Am I just giving you a scare too? What'll you give me for not blowing your brains out?"

traits.locale_text: "Ach ja? Tja, ich hab's Euch abgekauft!" {n}Der Bettler wirkt erleichtert und kichert unterwürfig, dann zieht er seine eigene Waffe und richtet sie auf dich. Sein Lächeln ist verschwunden.{/n} "Also, was glaubt Ihr? Will ich Euch auch nur ein bisschen Angst machen? Was gebt Ihr mir dafür, dass ich Euch nicht das Gehirn rauspuste?"
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: « Ah ouais ? Ben, je suis tombé dans le panneau ! » {n}Visiblement soulagé, le mendiant laisse échapper un petit rire obséquieux avant de dégainer son arme et de la pointer sur vous, toute trace de sourire disparue.{/n} « Et ça, hein, qu'est-ce que vous en dites ? Je plaisante ou pas ? Qu'est-ce que vous me filez pour que je vous explose pas la tronche ? »
languages.original_text: "Yeah? Well, you had me fooled!" {n}The beggar looks relieved and giggles obsequiously, then pulls out his own weapon, and points it at you. His smile is gone.{/n} "Now, what do you reckon? Am I just giving you a scare too? What'll you give me for not blowing your brains out?"

traits.locale_text: « Ah ouais ? Ben je suis tombé dans le panneau ! » {n}Visiblement soulagé, le mendiant laisse échapper un petit rire obséquieux avant de dégainer son arme et de la pointer sur vous, toute trace de sourire disparue.{/n} « Et ça, hein, qu'est-ce que vous en dites ? Je plaisante ou pas ? Qu'est-ce que vous me donnez pour que je vous explose pas la tronche ? »
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: "Şaka mı? Aklımı çıkardın!" {n}Rahatlamış gözüken dilenci, sana yaranmaya çalışırcasına kıkırdıyor. Sonra kendi silahını çıkarıp sana doğrultuyor. Yüzündeki gülümseme kayboluyor.{/n} "Buna ne diyorsun? Şaka yapıyor muyumdur? Kafanı uçurmamam karşılığında bana ne vereceksin?"
languages.original_text: "Yeah? Well, you had me fooled!" {n}The beggar looks relieved and giggles obsequiously, then pulls out his own weapon, and points it at you. His smile is gone.{/n} "Now, what do you reckon? Am I just giving you a scare too? What'll you give me for not blowing your brains out?"

traits.locale_text: "Öyle mi? Beni kandırdın ama!" {n}Dilenci rahatlamış gözüküyor ve sana yaranmaya çalışırcasına kıkırdıyor. Sonra kendi silahını çıkarıp sana doğrultuyor. Yüzündeki gülümseme artık yok.{/n} "Şimdi ne düşünüyorsun? Seni korkutmaya mı çalışıyorum? Kafanı uçurmamam karşılığında bana ne vereceksin?"
traits.speaker: TrampMain
